title: FF! Doc | IdocSender
paragraphs: Using any other value will be rejected.
listItems: SELECT For queries that return data
UPDATEBLOB For queries that update a BLOB
UPDATECLOB For queries that update a CLOB
PACKAGE To execute Oracle PL/SQL package
OTHER For queries that return no data

IdocSender
SendersEndpointSAP
Implementation of sender that sends an IDoc to SAP. N.B. The sending of the iDoc is committed right after the XA transaction is completed.
See also
Github - IdocSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.extensions.sap.IdocSender
Syntax
Copy
<IdocSender query=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
query	text	-
A SQL statement that calls a stored procedure. The statement should begin with the CALL or EXEC SQL keyword depending on SQL dialect. In case of doubt, the safe choice is to always start with CALL and choose Oracle dialect.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
queryType	options	OTHER
The query type. For stored procedures, valid query types are AbstractJdbcQuerySender.QueryType.SELECT and AbstractJdbcQuerySender.QueryType.OTHER. Use AbstractJdbcQuerySender.QueryType.SELECT when your stored proc
